wikipedia_page.main: Septimus Francom (14 September 1882 – 15 March 1965) was a British long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1912 Summer Olympics.

response: * Septimus Francom, English athlete, born in Thingwall.
* Septimus Francom, English athlete, died in Barnston.
